title: Ronaldo Noodle Hair DIY Tutorial: How to Get the Iconic Look

steps.title: Wet your hair and divide it into sections.
steps.content: Wet your hair and divide it into sections. Get your hair damp, then divide it into four sections. If you have longer hair and want more curls, divide it into more than four sections. [1] X Research source

steps.title: Curl each section into a coil with your finger, then secure it.
steps.content: Curl each section into a coil with your finger, then secure it. Take the end of each section and curl it with your finger to make a tight coil. Then, secure the hair with a hair clamp, hair tie, or rubber band. Repeat this process with the other sections of hair. [2] X Research source

steps.title: Spray your hair with sea salt spray and let it sit for 10 minutes.
steps.content: Spray your hair with sea salt spray and let it sit for 10 minutes. After all of your hair is sectioned off, coiled, and secured, spray it with sea salt spray about 5-6 times. Make sure to spray each coiled section of your hair, then let it settle for about 10 minutes. [3] X Research source The sea salt spray will help shape your hair, assisting in the curling process. Hair stylist Nick Arrojo recommends using products to help your curls last longer, like a body-building foam or a leave-in conditioner .

steps.title: Remove the hair clamps and unravel your hair with your fingers or a comb.
steps.content: Remove the hair clamps and unravel your hair with your fingers or a comb. After the 10 minutes are up, remove the items securing your hair. Then, gently run your fingers or a comb through your hair to unravel it. Once the hair is unraveled, gently shake your head to bring out some more volume.

steps.title: Spray blonde temporary hair color spray for the total noodle look.
steps.content: Spray blonde temporary hair color spray for the total noodle look. Once your hair is unraveled and resembling Ronaldo’s, finish the look off by spraying blonde temporary hair color spray on the tips of your hair. Use the spray until you achieve your desired color.

steps.title: Ronaldo sported noodle hair during his peak years.
steps.content: Ronaldo sported noodle hair during his peak years. When Cristiano Ronaldo was wearing his noodle hair, he was regularly outperforming many star players on the field. He won various titles with Real Madrid, performed well with Juventus, and even secured his fifth Champions League win while sporting the noodle hair. Due to his strong performances while rocking the noodle hair, many fans associate the hairstyle with Ronaldo’s prime years. [4] X Research source Ronaldo is the first player to win the Champions League five times.

steps.title: Noodle hair looks great on people with a square face, but anyone can rock it!
steps.content: Noodle hair looks great on people with a square face, but anyone can rock it! A square face shape is fairly symmetrical and uniform, making it ideal for all kinds of hairstyles. Styles that sport short sides and longer tops pair the best with this face shape, making Ronaldo’s noodle hair the perfect style to go with. The noodle hair can also cover the hairline and make your head seem slightly longer. [5] X Research source With that said, any face shape can pull off the iconic noodle hairstyle.

steps.title: Cristiano Ronaldo’s natural hair is thick, black, and curly.
steps.content: Cristiano Ronaldo’s natural hair is thick, black, and curly. Ronaldo has sported many haircuts throughout the years, from highlights to frosted tips. He’s even worn a buzz cut before! But, his natural hair is thick, black, and curly. As a kid his curls were more defined, but as he grew up, Ronaldo started to slick his hair back with hair gel while keeping the sides shaved. [6] X Research source Ronaldo first started rocking the noodle hair in 2017.

steps.title: Open the character creator screen.
steps.content: Open the character creator screen. Before you can get Ronaldo’s noodle hair, you have to start creating your character. Once you open the game, click play, then go to the career option. If you have a character, click the New Career option in the dropdown menu. On the new screen, select Player Career, then click Create Your Pro. [7] X Research source

steps.title: Pick out the details for your character.
steps.content: Pick out the details for your character. Choose your player’s first and last name, kit name, kit number, team, birthday, and country of origin. Then, choose their general attributes, like height, weight, position, and role. After that, pick a face shape, skin color, eyes, ears, nose, mouth, jaw, and brow type. [8] X Research source

steps.title: Select the short hair style and blonde color.
steps.content: Select the short hair style and blonde color. In the head section, scroll to hair and select short hair. Then, scroll through the hairstyles until you land on the third page. Once you’re on the third page, select the fourth hair option from the top left. It is a short, curly cut. After choosing the hairstyle, scroll through the color options on the bottom of the screen until you reach your desired blonde. [9] X Research source There are various shades of brown and blonde, so choose the one you think is best!
